description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- August 20th, 2024

description: We take a look at the Pariah Nexus mission rules from White Dwarf #502, which make it possible to play Crusade games using the Pariah Nexus missions deck.
title: Goonhammer Reviews: Pariah Nexus Crusades Rules in White Dwarf 502

description: Today is the first in a series of articles taking a look at different factions from the skirmish version of Conquest: First Blood (FB). While some of the regiment’s ability might be familiar to The Last Argument of Kings (LAOK) – the two games play differently, so while regiments might feel familiar it’ll be important […]
title: Conquest First Blood Faction Review: The City States

description: I’ve been going to GenCon for a long time now, and I love the chance to run games, try out new RPGs and board games, and catch up with friends I only get to see once a year. Last year was the first time I had allowed “work” to intrude on my busy vacation/entertainment schedule […]
title: Turn Order: Checking Out Asmodee at GenCon

description: I’ll admit it, I was not a fan of the Star Wars show Rebels when it first aired.  I have, however, given it another chance, and now the story of the Spectres is one of my favorite stories in all of Star Wars lore. When these characters were announced for Shatterpoint, I was very excited […]
title: Star Wars Shatterpoint: Make the Impossible Possible Squad Pack Review
